resources.string: Simplify your life by automating actions you do every day. SmartActions can silence your ringer when you\'re in a meeting, send a text message when you arrive at a location, or make sure you never miss an important call.
SMARTACTIONS simplifies your life by automating the things you do every day.
Create a new SmartAction from scratch.

SMARTACTIONS helps you automate things you do every day.

For example, you can use a SmartAction to silence your ringer when you're in a meeting or send a text message when you arrive at a location.

Based on how you use your phone, you may get a suggestion to adopt a SmartAction that will help you.

There are also sample SmartActions that you can browse and add to your collection.

If you're feeling creative, you can even make your own SmartAction. Simply tell SMARTACTIONS what you want to do and when you want it to happen.
Are you sure you wish to delete this SmartAction?\n\nThis action cannot be undone.
You have edited this SmartAction.\n Would you like to save these changes before leaving?
Without Triggers, you will need to turn this SmartAction on and off manually.

Touch the plus sign to add actions to your SmartAction.

Location is determined using Wi-Fi. If you choose to turn off Wi-Fi or enable Airplane mode, location-based SmartActions will not work correctly.
Wi-Fi must be ON for the Location trigger to accurately detect where you are located.

Airplane mode is on, which disables SmartActions\'s ability to detect location.\n Would you like to turn off Airplane mode?

"You've received a suggestion for a personalized SmartAction based on how you use your phone."
"You can access this and other suggestions at a later time in the SmartActions application"
SmartActions are actions that happen automatically when they\'re triggered by something, like your location or the time of day.
You already have one or more Drive SmartActions. Would you like to pair to an existing Drive SmartAction or create a new one?
The Drive SmartAction helps you stay connected while you focus on driving.
Send an \"I\'m driving\" auto-reply to text messages
Would you like SmartActions to help you become a safer driver?
Select the option that best applies to you.
A Bluetooth device can help by automatically turning Drive Smart on or off.
I pair to a Bluetooth device in my vehicle.
I use a Motorola Vehicle Navigation Dock.
You can view or edit this SmartAction at any time through the SmartActions application.
Use the Drive widget on your home screen to turn the SmartAction on and off.
You can automate the Drive SmartAction later by adding a vehicle navigation dock or Bluetooth device through the SmartActions application.
Congratulations! You\'re all set to go. The Drive SmartAction will automatically turn on and off.
You can go to the SmartActions application to view or change your Drive SmartAction preferences.
Congratulations! You\'re all set to go. The Drive SmartAction will automatically turn on and off.
You can go to the SmartActions application to view or change your Drive SmartAction preferences.
